name: Nina Ricci Eau de Perfume
description: This arrives on the market in 2009, as a fragrance for glamorous and urban heroines. It is composed of rhubarb, bergamot, moonflower, Indian tuberose, centifolia rose, patchouli and sandalwood

name: Chanel Chance Parfume
description: Chanel Chance Perfume a floral fragrance in a round bottle. Unpredictable, in perpetual movement, Chanel Chance sweeps you into its whirlwind of happiness and fantasy. An olfactory encounter with chance.

name: Burberry For Women Perfume
description: Burberry Perfume is a striking but minimalist fragrance that honors the city of London and the women who call it their home. It opens with fresh, succulent notes of blackcurrant and fresh green apple

name: Jimmy Choo Blossom Perfume
description: Embody the beauty of spring with the Jimmy Choo Blossom Spray, a fruity floral womens fragrance with woody facets. Top Notes about this are Exotic Fruit Accord, Frangipani Flower, Sandalwood mixture

name: Britney Spears Fantasy In Bloom
description: Fantasy In Bloom Perfume by Britney Spears, released in 2017 . A radiant fruity floral perfume with a great presence. Full of fun and excitement. A terrific choice for a summer or spring scent.

name: Carolina Herrera Good Girl EDP
description: The sweet, breathtaking and alluring qualities of Jasmine, bring a bright of femininity. The Good Girlâ€™s mysterious side is express with richly fragrant Cocoa, Almond and Coffee bring notes of bold vibrancy.
